body: {"prompt":"[INST]You are a very intelligent bot with exceptional critical thinking.[/INST]You went to the market and bought 12 apples. I gave 2 apples to your friend and 2 apples to your teacher. To the 3 apples, I then went and bought 5 more apples and ate 1. How many apples did I remain with?\n\nLet's think step by step.", "max_gen_len": 256}
